enWisdom: Being bound by straps is better [and more preferable] than accompanying the adversary

Wisdom: لَمْ يَهْنَأِ الْعَيْشَ مَنْ قَارَنَ الضِّدَّ
enWisdom: One who stays in the company of his enemy does not enjoy a happy life
One who accompanies his adversary exhausts his body

Wisdom: مَنْ قَارَنَ ضِدَّهُ كَشَفَ عَيْبَهُ وَعَذَّبَ قَلْبَهُ
enWisdom: Whoever accompanies his adversary, he will expose his flaw and torment his heart
How evil a colleague the enemy is!

Wisdom: لِكُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ نَكَدٌ وَنَكَدُ الْعُمُرِ مُقَارَنَةُ الْعَدُوِّ
enWisdom: For everything there is a vexation and the vexation of your lifetime is [being in] the company of an enemy
